EDUCATION

University of Trieste, University of Groningen

October 2016, Dicember 2018

Master of Science Course in Theoretical Chemistry & Computational Modelling

The Master in Theoretical Chemistry and Computational Modelling (TCCM) is meant to prepare experts in using and developing molecular science and computational techniques to either work with innovative pharmaceutical, petrochemical and new materials industries or to follow future doctoral studies in Chemistry, Physics, Life or Material Sciences.

Dissertation Title:

Theoretical Investigation of Singlet Fission in Organic Molecules

Supervisors:

Prof. Mauro Stener, Dr. W. A. Havenith, Prof. Dr. S. Farji

Description
Reserch work consisting in actively develop, execute experiments and procreatively analyze and discuss the results.

UnoBuild (Melbourne, Victoria, AU)- Carpentry, Masonry, Painting

February 2020 – November 2020

Construction and maintenance work. Besides the work in itself my responsibilities were diverse.

  1. Ensure the job was keeping up with the schedule and, if not, find a solution to make it happen.
  2. Make sure the working site was always safe and clean from obstacles.
  3. Open the working site every morning and prepare the necessary tools and materials.
  4. Close the site every evening making sure to safely store all tools and materials.
  5. Check the inventory regularly and make sure there was everything needed for the next days.
  6. Oversee the delivery of new materials/machines to the working site making sure no mistakes were made.
  7. Organize the work for my colleagues making sure they were as time efficient as possible.
  8. Helping my work colleagues when needed and teach them how to complete specific tasks.
  9. Engage in conversations with house owners and/or tenants of apartment units to ask about job related inquires or to answer their questions.
  10. Keep the head of the company always informed.
